title: Hour 2: False Alarm, Durant Staying
description:
Stephen A, Jay Williams, Sam Acho and Monica McNutt react to Kevin Durant breaking news: Are the Nets the East favorites? Also, how many AFC West teams make the playoffs?

itunes:subtitle: What does KD's rescinded trade offer mean for Brooklyn's championship aspirations?
